title: Coronavirus: Italy brings in Covid certificate amid spike in infections
content:
1. Coronavirus: Italy brings in Covid certificate amid spike in infections  BBC News
  2. Italy to Require Proof of Vaccination or Negative Test for Social Activities  The New York Times
  3. Italy imposes ‘green pass’ restrictions on unvaccinated people  The Guardian
  4. Italy makes health pass mandatory for many leisure activities, in bid to pressure the unvaccinated  The Washington Post
  5. Italy to require COVID-19 'pass' for many activities  Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: コロナウイルス。イタリアでは感染者が急増する中、Covid社の証明書を導入
